Title: Main Gate Bridge

Options.Label: (Show Work Permit) — enter as a hired hand.
(Pay 20g) — bribe the clerk for a fast stamp.
(Smuggler's wave) — take the river-gate side stair.

Description: The city's throat: steel, stamps, and watchful halberds.
Paragraphs: Bridge chains creak; Watch-halberds glitter in the mist. A clerk's desk squats beneath a salt-faded banner.
Chains bite into the draw as the river yawns below. A clerk's desk, scarred by rain and ink, sits beneath a salt-faded banner.
Queue lines knot with carters, pilgrims, and old soldiers. The Watch read faces like writs; the wrong expression costs more than twenty coin.
